DOC.HEADLINE: O.C. RELIGION NOTES / DAYE CLARK
DOC.TEXT: Pastor David Hicks was recently installed as the new senior pastor of Crown Valley Community Church in Laguna Niguel.He served at First Covenant Church in Oakland before accepting this position . Originally from the Pasadena area , he is returning to Southern California following 25 years in youth ministry . Sunday services at the church are at 10 a.m. , at 24600 La Plata . Information : ( 714 ) 495-6071 .
